Name: Shadows of the Past
Description:
The Fisalia family's heir seems to have a request.
In Thessaleo Fells, a mysterious Terminal is flickering with ominous light. What secrets of the past might it hold?
QuestDesc:
The Fisalia family's heir seems to have a request.
In Thessaleo Fells, a mysterious Terminal is flickering with ominous light. What secrets of the past might it hold?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Something's off here. Traces of the Dark Tide's power linger...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, one who has passed the trial.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't know what kind of person you are, but your strength is undeniable, among the world's finest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Drawing on the mechanics of the Thorncrown Rises and the Remnant Energy within Nimbus Sanctum, I have recreated powerful frequencies from various dimensions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To amplify these frequencies to the necessary strength, we even risked harnessing the power of the Dark Tide.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have taken on the job from Fisalia, exerting great effort and even collaborating with those from the Order, all to harness these "phantoms of salvation" and bring forth a true "savior."

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Savior, no matter which family you hail from, we have prepared a generous welcome gift for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The "Savior's Proof," obtainable only here and forged into crest coins from the wealth of Fisalia, will bring you endless riches!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To obtain them, you must become stronger and embrace continuous challenges!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phantom
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I await here, eagerly anticipating the emergence of the "Savior"!

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've returned, Victor! How did it go?

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm not going to lie, they've entrusted this place to me, but I truly don't know how to handle that Terminal.

Options.PlotLineKey: It's better not to tell him.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (He genuinely seems unaware... Should I tell him the truth?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You told Botim everything the phantom revealed...

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It all makes sense now... So that's what it is... Yes, I understand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Esteemed Savior, thank you for sharing the truth with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Certainly, anything you gain from the Terminal is well-deserved. If you wish, you may proceed to the Terminal at any time to undertake the trials.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have personal matters to attend to, so I'll take my leave for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Botim left, weighed down by his worries.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (He really seems unaware... It's probably best not to tell him.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm on it. Just a few dangerous monsters left to handle, but I'll see it through.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm... I'm not sure how to express my gratitude... but truly, thank you so much!

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Honored guest from afar, I am relieved to finally see you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm afraid it's not right to burden you with such a troublesome matter, but I can't think of anyone else capable of handling it.

Options.PlotLineKey: Heh, lucky for you, you came to the right person.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This isn't as complicated as it seems.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew you would be willing to help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Recently, my family entrusted me with managing an ancestral site, where a handed-down "Terminal" still remains.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This thing... it has a certain malevolence to it, you understand?

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shadowy monsters frequently emerge from within, causing chaos before disappearing on their own.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm asking for your assistance in dealing with these shadows, and rest assured, you'll be well compensated.

Dialogues.Speaker: Botim
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I entrust this task to you, and I shall await your triumph here.
